short_summary: Canadian Construction Materials Centre request for standing offers for technical services by subject matter experts
description: From time to time the Canadian Construction Materials Centre (CCMC) requires the technical services of subject matter experts in relevant construction product domains. The CCMC seeks to establish standing offers (SOs) with a variety of contractos. These contractors (e.g., engineers, scientists, consultants and other knowledgeable professionals) have expertise in the relevant construction products—and the performance, characterization and qualification of those products—as well as how they comply with Canadian codes and standards.  The awarded SO will be valid for one year. The National Research Council Canada (NRC) reserves the option to renew the SO effective April 1, 2024 for an additional period of one year at a time and for a maximum of four years, subject to satisfactory performance.
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement Notice**
**Construction and Technical Services**
**Issued by:** National Research Council Canada (NRC)

**Request for Standing Offers (RFSO) – CCMC – Technical Services by Subject Matter Experts**

The National Research Council Canada (NRC) invites tenders for a Request for Standing Offers (RFSO) to provide technical services by subject matter experts under the banner of the Canadian Construction Materials Centre (CCMC).

**Objective:**
The CCMC requires technical services from knowledgeable professionals with expertise in construction product domains, including performance, characterization, and qualification of construction products, as well as compliance with Canadian codes and standards.

**Scope of Work:**
The RFSO aims to establish standing offers with a variety of contractors who possess the necessary expertise and qualifications. Standing offers will be awarded for a period of one (1) year, with the possibility of renewal for an additional period of one (1) year at a time, for a maximum of four (4) years.

**Contract Requirements:**
* Sole source contracts will cover a specific scope of work.
* Contract duration will be one (1) year, with an option for renewal.

**Trade Agreement Provisions:**
The RFSO is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

**Tender Documents:**
Additional information, including the Request for Standing Offers (RFSO) document, bidding instructions, and appendices, may be obtained via the following links:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/12/648278d937cbe3d54e9c250c650df5e5/doc_ccmc_demande_pour_des_services_techniques_fournis_par_des_specialistes.pdf

Tender documents will be accepted electronically through the Canada Buys website.

**Inquiries:**
Any questions or concerns about the RFSO should be directed to Stephane Lajoie, NRC, at stephane.lajoie@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca.

**Tender Closing Date:** February 21, 2023, 2
